      • getFoodsFromPastMeals

        private java.util.Set<Food> getFoodsFromPastMeals()
        This method returns the set of food consumed by the user for the past three days.
        Returns:
        the set of food consumed by the user for the past three days

      • checkNutrient

        private java.lang.String[] checkNutrient(java.util.List<java.util.Set<Food>> result,
                                         java.lang.String type,
                                         double remaining,
                                         double perMeal)
        This method checks the corresponding nutrient in each food of the menu, comparing it to the user's remaining nutrient for the day, as well as the suitable amount per meal for the user.
        Parameters:
        result - the list of food of the menu
        type - the type of nutrient
        remaining - the remaining nutrient for the day for the user
        perMeal - the suitable amount of nutrient for the user
        Returns:
        an array containing the information about the amount of nutrient (suitable or not)

      • calculateScores

        private int[] calculateScores(java.lang.String[][] scores)
        This method calculates the final score of each choice in the menu base on all factors.
        Parameters:
        scores - the resulting scores after considering all factors
        Returns:
        an array of the scores of each choice in the menu

      • findMax

        private int findMax(int[] finalScore)
        This method returns the maximum integer in an array
        Parameters:
        finalScore - an array of integers
        Returns:
        the maximum in the array

      • generateReply

        private java.lang.String generateReply(java.lang.String[] scores,
                                       java.lang.String finalChoice)
        This method prepares a response to the user base on all the different factors to help the user to pick from the menu.
        Parameters:
        scores - the scoring information of the final choice in each factor
        finalChoice - the name of the final choice from the menu
        Returns:
        the reply to the user
